title: Bug 101187: Localization key can't be blank when adding.
description: When adding a localization key, if the key is left blank, the externalized text cannot be displayed in the chart.
OB: The externalized text is not displayed in the chart title when the key in the properties file is left blank.
EB: The externalized text should be displayed in the chart title even if the key in the properties file is left blank.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Open the properties file. 
2. Leave the key blank, but provide a valid value for it. 
3. Check the chart title to confirm that the externalized text is not displayed.
